name: Hyper Morph
description:
-The objective of the game is to complete levels as fast as possible using only object transformations. Play the starting Levels for a tutorial.

-This game is very keyboard focused and requires quick movement from both hands placed on the keyboard in order to get good scores.

-Use translation, rotation or scale and any of the axes X-axis, Y-axis and Z-Axis to move throughout the levels.
-Use Increment/Decrement buttons to transform in positive or negative direction respectively.
-InGame icons will depict any selected transformation and axes.
-Control the camera by Panning it or Zoom In/Out.
